your welcome :)

as to your request:
i dont have the original Bonfire myself to rip, but i have a Bonfire release that someone else did:

Bonfire (5 CD Bon Scott Tribute)
-Back in Black (Remastered)
-Let There Be Rock- The Movie (CD1)
-Let There Be Rock- The Movie (CD2)
-Live from the Atlantic Studios
-Volts

a total of 54 files (with covers and playlists) and 273 MB

i can make a torrent for this...

i added this now, hope its what you wanted:
